name: Link Importer and converter for Obsidian/Github/Pandoc/Markor and others
description:
Intro

This script imports and exports links from other editors such as Obsidian/VS Code/Github/Markor/Pandoc into QOwnNotes and vice versa. It allows for quick switching between markdown editors. Unfortunately markdown as a language is not as well defined as orgmode for instance. Especially heading Fragments and URL encoding of links differ quite significantly ([note](note.md#heading-fragment) vs. [note](note.md#Heading%20Fragment)). In practice, links to headings will break if one does not adapt the links to the specific needs of the editor. They might be readable by the editor, but renaming of notes / headings might break links silently, without you noticing.

Usage

Caution! Backup your data before you use this script as it might break all you links!

Simply copy files or folders into the QN Foldersystem. Then press the import/export button in the script menu, depending on which style you prefer. Done. For further info see Ways to improve compatibility with other markdown editors.
